ClassDesc: Use the https:##developer#android#com@B_android#support#v4#app#FragmentHostCallback_E@ Integration points with the Fragment host. Fragments may be hosted by any object; such as an @B_android#app#Activity_E@. In order to host fragments, implement @B_android#app#FragmentHostCallback_E@, overriding the methods applicable to the host.
